sentences: Bang Ye-dam (Korean: 방예담; born May 7, 2002) is a South Korean singer and member of the boy band, Treasure  under YG Entertainment.
He is best known for competing in the second installment of K-pop Star (2012–2013) where he finished as runner-up.
In June 2013, Bang was scouted by YG Entertainment and joined as a trainee.
Following a seven-year training period, he released the digital single titled "Wayo" (왜요) on June 5, 2020.
Thereafter, he debuted with Treasure on August 7.
